Member Function Documentation
Link() Linkgame.logic.tile.TileView game.logic.tile.TileViewLink
void game.logic.tile.TileView.Link (TileViewModel tileVM)[inline]
Links the specified TileViewModel to the current object and updates its position.
Parameters
tileVM
The TileViewModel instance containing the position data.
This method assigns the provided tileVM to a private field and updates the position of the current object based on the X and Y coordinates from the tileVM . The Z coordinate is set to 0. This is typically used in a graphical context where the position of a tile needs to be updated in a 2D space.

This method does not return any value and does not take any parameters.
Update() Updategame.logic.tile.TileView game.logic.tile.TileViewUpdate
void game.logic.tile.TileView.Update ( )[inline], [private]
Updates the view based on the current state of the tile view model.
This method is responsible for refreshing or updating the user interface to reflect any changes made to the underlying tile view model (_tileVM). It is typically called whenever there is a need to synchronize the view with the model, ensuring that the displayed information is accurate and up-to-date. The implementation details of how the view is updated will depend on the specific requirements of the application and the structure of the view model.
